alert.note: Alert for Burns BLM (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 16 at 1:25PM PDT until July 17 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...LOW HUMIDITY AND BREEZY WINDS WILL CREATE CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS BELOW 5000 FT ON SUNDAY... .An approaching area of low pressure will increase winds across southeastern Oregon on Sunday afternoon and evening. Windy conditions will combine with low humidity and critically dry fuels to create hazardous fire weather conditions below 5000 ft. Conditions are expected to improve Sunday evening. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 8 PM PDT SUNDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR BURNS BLM...WHICH IS FIRE WEATHER ZONE 636... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 2 PM to 8 PM PDT Sunday. * WINDS...Gusts 25 to 30 mph Sunday afternoon and evening. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...6 to 15 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
